Html:
When I look in the gear window on the right to see which weapon would be best for me, if I currently have a staff equipped with +81 spellpower, it will show all items with +81 spellpower.

This causes huge problems with 1H weapons, especially because it doesn't just add 81 spellpower to them, it adds 0 spellpower to them because you cannot have the 81sp enchant on a 1H weapon.

If you could fix this so 1H weapons automatically have the +63 enchant on them while staves have the +81 sp enchant that'd be a big help to seeing which weapons will be best for me.

Thanks
We're aware of this issue; we're working on a solution.
